title: Mandatory updates available!
info: A new version of the Ledger Vault app and firmware must be installed on your device before you can connect to your workspace.
infobox: Your application is not up to date. Download our ledger-update software so you can update your app and your firmware. Contact support if needed.

steps.waitReboot: Your device should be rebooting, click on continue when you are back on device's dashboard.
steps.waitProcessing: Please wait while the device is processing
steps.promptDeny: Accept or deny the instatllion the device
steps.ready-to-login: Your device is ready to use the vault. You can login to the platform.

userSteps.step1: On your device, click the close icon in the top right corner to go back to the <0>Dashboard</0>.
userSteps.step2: On the web app, click <0>Update firmware and app</0>.
